Title: IMarkupExtension with bindable properties

Description: Shows workarounds to the DynamicResource limitations

Description: Attempt the x:DataType for accessing list of list of strings.

Description: Use Grids to position absolute and floating buttons.

Description: Demonstrates RadioButton BindingContext fixes to RadioButton.Content.

Title: IconImageSource and ToolbarItem not working as expected
Description: Shows the DPI Font Size workaround needed for Windows.

Title: MAUI MVVM partial method being called twice
Description: Editor may fire additional OnTextChanged if newlines are different.

Description: A demonstration of generic subclasses of MCT 12 Popups.

Description: Not reproducible with the provided code snippets.

Description: Reduce complexity by subclassing GraphicsView and adding the IDrawable interface.

Description: Setting the x:DataType to a more concrete type.
